ygData.subject: Re: Medium Bronze Plate
ygData.msgSnippet: The lowest level characters I have seen at the lake are around 15th level. You might be ok with a good group, but it would be very tough.  Banded armor would
ygData.messageBody:
The lowest level characters I have seen at the lake are around 15th level.
You might be ok with a good group, but it would be very tough. Banded armor
would be best for you for the next few levels, or if you are wealthy,
purchase the bronze from some higher level characters.

Grod

-----Original Message-----
From: Gary Long [mailto:glong@...]
Sent: Monday, June 21, 1999 12:23 PM
To: eqpaladin@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eqpaladin] Medium Bronze Plate


From: Gary Long <glong@...>

Hail Grod,

What level are the creatures who carry the small bronze? Would my 12th
level
paladin have a chance against them when grouped with 3-5 characters of 12th
level?

My thanks for any information you are willing to share,
Kaladin, the small-size armor wearing Paladin

Rodney Miller wrote:

> From: Rodney Miller <RMiller@...>
>
> I have found quite a bit of small bronze plate at Lake Rathetear. Does
> anyone know where to find medium bronze plate? I have seen many people
> wearing it, but noone discussing where to find it. I am more than willing
> to travel.
>
> Let me know if you have any info.
>
> Grod
